name: THE Campus Live ANZ, September 2024 | Newcastle, Australia
content: THE Campus Live ANZ is back and it promises to be a gathering of top leaders and policy experts dedicated to shaping the future of higher education. For 2024, we look forward to higher education leaders, educators and experts coming together again to focus on how to best serve modern-day learners across Australia and New Zealand. The programme, carefully curated by THE's content team in partnership with our host the University of Newcastle, will focus on: - International outlook - Strategy, operations and governance - Teaching, learning and student experience We believe that coming together to collaborate, exchange ideas and discuss shared challenges is what will change and develop the future of education. Secure your tickets now and be part of the conversation! Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2550209-0?pid=4868 Time: 9:00 AM - 1:30 PM Venue Details: University of Newcastle, University Drive, Callaghan, New South Wales, 2308, Australia Price: University | Early Bird: AUD 249.00
